name: balAccordionIsOpen
description: Asserts if the accordion is open.

name: balAccordionIsClosed
description: Asserts if the accordion is closed.

name: balDatepickerToggle
description: Opens and closes the datepicker popover.

name: balDatepickerIsOpen
description: Assert if the datepicker popover is open.

name: balDatepickerIsClosed
description: Assert if the datepicker popover is closed.

name: balDatepickerPick
description: Picks the date in the datepicker like a human.

name: balDatepickerIsDateInRange
description: Asserts if the given date is in range in the datepicker popover.

name: balDatepickerIsDateNotInRange
description: Asserts if the given date is not in range in the datepicker popover.

name: balFieldFindHint
description: Returns the hint component of the label.

name: balHintFindOverlay
description: Returns the hint content overlay with the title, content and the close button.

name: balHintFindCloseButton
description: Returns the close button of the overlay content.

name: balInputStepperIncrease
description: Increases the value of the control

name: balInputStepperDecrease
description: Decreases the value of the control

name: balModalFindOpen
description: Finds the open modal and returns it.

name: balModalIsOpen
description: Assert if the modal is open.

name: balModalIsClosed
description: Assert if the modal is closed. Only works for modals,
which are not created with the modal service.

name: balModalClose
description: Closes the selected modal.

name: balPaginationFindPages
description: Returns all the page buttons.

name: balPaginationFindCurrentPage
description: Returns the current listed page button.

name: balPaginationFindNextButton
description: Returns the next button to navigate to next page.

name: balPaginationFindPreviousButton
description: Returns the previous button to navigate to previous page.

name: balPopoverToggle
description: Opens and closes the popover.

name: balPopoverIsOpen
description: Asserts if the popover is open.

name: balPopoverIsClosed
description: Asserts if the popover is closed.

name: balPopoverTriggerContains
description: Asserts if the trigger button contains the given content.
signature:
(
      content: string | number | RegExp,
      options?: Partial<Loggable & Timeoutable & CaseMatchable & Shadow>,
    ): Chainable<JQuery>

name: balPopoverContentContains
description: Asserts if the popover menu contains the given content.
signature:
(
      content: string | number | RegExp,
      options?: Partial<Loggable & Timeoutable & CaseMatchable & Shadow>,
    ): Chainable<JQuery>

name: balSelectFindOptions
description: Returns the select options.

name: balSelectFindChips
description: Returns the closable select chips (only with multiselect).

name: balSelectShouldHaveOptions
description: Asserts that the select has the given options.
signature:
(
      labels: string[],
      dataType?: 'label' | 'value',
      options?: Partial<Loggable>,
    ): Chainable<JQuery>

name: balSnackbarFind
description: Returns the visible snackbars.

name: balTabsFindActionButton
description: Returns the action button element.

name: balTabsFindItems
description: Returns the tab items.

name: balTabsFindLabel
description: Returns the label of the tab item.

name: balTabsShouldHaveItems
description: Assert that the tab has the given item.
signature:
(
      labels: string[],
      dataType?: 'label' | 'value',
      options?: Partial<Loggable>,
    ): Chainable<JQuery>

name: balTabItemShouldHaveState
description: Assert that the tab item has the  given state.

name: balToastFind
description: Returns the visible toasts.
